load-maps.blurb: Players can vote on a map, and it loads. Gameplay ends after four minutes, when players are teleported back to the lobby (includes timer UI).

spectate.blurb: Players in the lobby can spectate others while they are still playing.

custom-chat.blurb: Players in the lobby can't communicate with players in-game.

settings.blurb: Players can turn off shadows, music, and sound effects.

pick-roles.blurb: Sakamoto, assassins, and targets are randomly assigned to players. The more times a player is assigned Target, the greater their chance to be Sakamoto or Assassin.

sprinting.blurb: Targets can sprint for a short duration.

pick-styles.blurb: Players can spin for Hero & Assassin styles in the lobby.

win-condition.blurb: If all Targets die, Assassins win. If all Assassins die, Sakamoto wins (what if Sakamoto is dead first?). If the round ends, surviving Targets win (includes end-of-round UI modal).

sakamoto.blurb: This node helps organize the skill tree, but isn't a feature.

assassin.blurb: This node helps organize the skill tree, but isn't a feature.

punch.blurb: Sakamoto (rare) can deal damage with a punch attack.

kick.blurb: Sakamoto (rare) can deal damage with a kick attack.

mind-reader.blurb: Sakamoto (rare) can detect nearby enemies within a short radius by seeing them outlined in a faint glow.

pistol.blurb: Lu Shaotang can shoot a pistol with four shots and a cooldown.

dual-pistols.blurb: Lu Shaotang has an ability to dual-wield pistols with lighter damage and more shots.

legendary-attack.blurb: Attacks that build momentum as you combo on someone (what is the attack?).

bubblegum.blurb: Sakamoto (legendary) can spit bubblegum that expands into a sticky web, trapping Assassins in place for 3 seconds.

knife-slash.blurb: Rare assassins can deal damage by slashing with a knife.

knife-stealth-kills.blurb: Rare assassins can discreetly kill someone with their knife without making any noise.

sword-slash.blurb: Epic assassins can deal damage by slashing with a sword, which has a longer reach than a knife.

tofu-scramble.blurb: Epic assassins can do a barrage of sword attacks quickly.

sword-stealth-kills.blurb: Epic assassins can discreetly kill someone with their sword without making any noise.

camera-attack.blurb: Kanaguri can deal damage by hitting with his camera or tripod.

camera-flash.blurb: Kanaguri using his camera flash to blind others for two seconds.

camera-stealth-kills.blurb: Kanaguri can discreetly kill someone with his camera without making any noise.

dash.blurb: Non-legendary Assassins can quickly dash forward with a cooldown.

garments.blurb: If Sakamoto dies, a Target can pick up his 'Garments' to become Sakamoto.

levels.blurb: Players earn XP from surviving a whole match, winning a match, and kills. XP contributes to the player's level.

yen.blurb: Players can purchase (or gift) Yen with Robux or earn it from gameplay.

style-slots.blurb: Players can purchase (or gift) extra slots to store Hero & Assassin styles. Style slots can be locked.

lucky-spins.blurb: Players can purchase (or gift) lucky spins, which have a higher chance of spinning a legendary or mythic style.

redeem-codes.blurb: Players can redeem secret codes to earn style spins.

afk-chamber.blurb: Players who are AFK for a certain amount of time are teleported to a special place in the game, where they passively earn Yen.

packs.blurb: Players can buy (or gift) packs with Robux/Yen, which contain emotes, auras, capes, and kill effects.

daily-rewards.blurb: Players earn daily rewards of yen or style spins for playing the game.

auras.blurb: Players can equip auras to their character.

emotes.blurb: Players can equip emotes and play them at any time.

capes.blurb: Players can equip capes to their character.

kill-effects.blurb: Players can equip kill effects to their character.

stats.blurb: Players can view their stats in a lobby menu.

leaderboard.blurb: Players can press tab to see a list of all players in-game, separated into remaining players and lobby players.

global-leaderboards.blurb: Players can see the top ~20 players with the most hero wins, assassin wins, and rounds survived.
